title: Understanding URDF and TF for Humanoids
description: Welcome to Chapter 2 of Module 1! In this chapter, we will dive into two fundamental concepts in ROS 2 robotics: URDF (Unified Robot Description Format) and TF (Transform Frame). These are crucial for describing your robot's physical structure and understanding its position and orientation in a 3D space.

previous.title: Chapter 1: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2) - Introduction and Core Concepts
